m_szDocTitle: FPL Group Inc. Q1 2009 Earnings Call Transcript | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: FPL Group Inc. Q1 2009 Earnings Call Transcript FPL Group Inc. ( FPL-OLD ) Q1 2009 Earnings Call April 28, 2009  9:00 AM ET Executives Jim von Riesemann – Director, Investor Relations James Robo – President and Chief Operating Officer Lewis Hay – Chief Executive Officer Armando Pimental – Chief Financial Officer Mitch Davidson – President and Chief Executive Officer of NextEra Energy Resources Analysts Greg Gordon – Citi Investment Research [Asur Kahn] – Incremental Capital Annie Tsao – AllianceBernstein Operator Welcome to FPL Group first quarter 2009 earnings release conference call.  Today'
